attributes.background: Give the same Anti-discrimination rights to all people. These right given to alleged minority groups are being abused and so called majority group needs the same protection. Males, whites and heterosexual should not be allowed to be legally be discriminated against.

rejection.details:
It is already illegal to discriminate against someone because of their race, sex, or sexual orientation. So we're not sure what further action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/discrimination-your-rights
